characters.name: Mo-Ri Jin
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ G.O.H. Participant and Student
__Relatives:__ [Jin Tae-Jin](https://anilist.co/character/181867/TaeJin-Jin) (adoptive grandfather)
__Style:__ Renewal Taekwondo, Jin Mori Original

Jin Mori is introduced as a carefree and energetic student with an obsession for fighting. He loves eating and having fun. Mori can be seen as both confident and arrogant due to his identity later revealed. However, he still cares deeply about his friends and family, and will get serious when either of them are hurt or in danger.

Jin Mori was shown to be a dominant competitor in early stages of the G.O.H tournament. His fighting style in the anime is shown to resemble his adoptive grandfather's renewal taekwondo. He also has his own special technique which he names 'Jin Mori Original.' The first is called Blue Dragon Kick. His second is called Twin Dragon Blue Kick. His third and final technique is called Blue Dragon Tempest.

characters.name: Dae-Wi Han
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm

Dae-Wi is one of the main protagonists in The God Of Highschool. He was once part of the legendary duo named 'Mad Cows' and he is a very skilled fighter. Over time, he will become a close friend of Mo-Ri and Mi-Ra. He is a practitioner of the Kyokushin Karate (Full Contact Karate),

 ~!After training from Executive Q Dae-Wi is able to summon the charyeok Haetae!~

characters.name: Mi-Ra Yu
characters.description:
Yu Mira is the 25th Master of the Moon Light Sword Style. She was invited to participate in the God Of High School Tournament. ~!During the World Tournament and RagnarÖk, she received Original Greed and through it Ultio R bequeath her Okhwang's physical power (which he had previously stolen). Due to that, Sang Man-Duk recognized her as the Jade Emperor's successor.!~

(Source: God of Highschool Fandom Wiki)

characters.name: Mo-Ri Hui
characters.description: ~!Hui Mo-Ri was the main protagonist of G.O.H season 4 and the first-half of season 5, and was also the clone created by Jin Mo-Ri to go to the Human Realm with his gourd. As time went on he would become less of Jin Mo-Ri's clone and discover his true self.!~

characters.name: Il-Pyo Park
characters.description:
Park Ilpyo is the Meridional Jeolla Province Champion of the G.O.H Tournament. He is considered as one of the top 3 fighters in the country and is famously known as Sakyamuni Park Ilpyo. He is one of the main supporting characters of the series.

__After RagnarÖk__ ~!17 years after RagnarÖk, he becomes one of The Six and devoted himself to teaching Ssam-Su Taekkyeon.!~ 
__CHARYEOK__ ~!Nine-Tails Guardian: This is the Charyeok of Park Il-Pyo. It is currently the only Charyeok that changes the appearance of its user, besides Yu Mi-Ra's Yeo-Po Bong-Seon. It is one of the most powerful Charyeok seen to date it has been seen taking down multiple Charyeok in Greed's arsenal. The Nine-Tails Guardian is seen to give the wielder health generation, physical enhancements including enhanced strength and speed, and pyrokenesis.!~

characters.name: Mu-Jin Park
alt_names: The Youngest Member of The Six
characters.description:
__Race__: ~!Supreme God!~
__Style__: Borrowed Power User
__Charyeok__: Longinus

Mu-Jin Park is a member of the National Assembly of Korea, a member of The Six and the organizer of the G.O.H Tournament. ~!He changed his name from Mu-Bong Park to Mu-Jin Park 17 years before the story begins.!~
